author: joyvoister
content: good evening, i have a small testnet with a total of 64 validators, after 64 validators are already active on the network. i want to add new validators but after i create the key from parithosh sir's blog i am stuck at "awaiting activation" i have correctly created the mnemonic and imported it into the execution layer. but this is already 2 days after i run the validator node. is there a mistake in my configuration?
